title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 25 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 25 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Biden on the infrastructure deal. Biden is Obama's 3rd term, Carter's 2nd term. Crazy spending is creating inflation, disincentivizing work. Trump's economy was roaring, Biden is reversing it. President Trump to join Clay and Buck as their first guest on Tuesday. Biden's weird whisper. Harris goes to the border, claims she's been there before. Congresswoman compares the southern border to Ellis Island. Ellis Island processed LEGAL immigrants. Press doesn't ask Harris if she agrees. Canada only allowing 3500 people to attend Stanley Cup Finals, could take a lesson from DeSantis. Callers on Biden's mental state.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
